definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: In this article, the author discussed the strength and rigidity of the skull bones from the view of mechanics and bionics.
sentences.chinese: 從力學和仿生學角度，對顱骨的強度和剛度做了討論。

sentences.english: The relations between bionics and modern garments are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了現代與仿生學的關係。

sentences.english: To help scientists currently working on bionics research.
sentences.chinese: 幫助現在正在仿生學研究努力的科學家。

sentences.english: By replacing structural module, deicing robot can be transformed into line inspection robot.
sentences.chinese: 應用模塊化結構設計及仿生學原理設計了除冰機器人。

sentences.english: The importance of bionics suddenly hits you .
sentences.chinese: 你就會對仿生學的重要性恍然大悟。

sentences.english: This article tries to explore this subject from several perspectives of architecture.
sentences.chinese: 基於建築仿生學從不同角度對這一課題加以探討。

sentences.english: The motion and the cosmetics will be designed by biomimetics.
sentences.chinese: 而在動作及造形上也將根據仿生學來設計。

sentences.english: In virtue of bionics and so on, a new solution are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 借鑑仿生學等原理，本文提出一種新方案。
仿生學是一門新的科學。
